title: Doctor Who - Shada Ian Levine Special Edition
description:
With MANY thanks to 'A FAN' for supplying this, finally we can watch a complete Shada.  This is widely known as 'Ian Levine's Shada.'

From A Fan:

This is what IÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ve done.
 
Basically, this is IanÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s Shada Ã¢â‚¬â€œ but has been re-mastered to replace the VHS footage with DVD footage.
 
It has also been re-edited to flow better and to make its running time to similar to a standard BBC running time. This involved the loss of a lot of padding and general tightening up of the original version. (The original was nearly 20 minutes longer).  [Uploader's note: A Fan is referring to losing the padding in the animated scenes.]
 
It has also had foley work done to add in sound effects and the like that had been left of from LevineÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s original.

 I just want the fans to see and be able to have what he wonÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t give.
